name: BeatBoi
description:
BeatBoi is a reckless thrill seeker good at two things: listening to awesome beats and parkouring though deadly locations. In this edition of BeatBoi, you'll get to know him more as you wander through the tropics, a lovely city and a hellish metal factory.

As you play each level, you'll stay in sync with the beats of the level music to help BeatBoi jump higher.
